review.author: DevOps
findings: Fix 1 PASS: patterns.js normalizes actor/agent/owner + status/outcome bidirectionally (camelCase + snake_case). daily-integration.js adds actor alias.
Fix 2 PASS: mcp-bridge claimTask side-effect triggers task-pool read-before-work injection. Fire-and-forget with proper error handling.
Fix 3 PASS: daemon-handlers completion-detected invokes update-task-status then release-agent. Object-style IPC call handled by type-check shim.
Minor: two IPC calling conventions for update-task-status (positional vs object) — both supported, standardize later.
Minor: mild redundancy in pattern mining filters — normalizer already handles cases the filter re-checks. Not harmful.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
